name: @bactor/pg
description: Postgres provider for Mastra - includes both vector and db storage capabilities

scripts.build: bun run rimraf dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir=./dist --target=node --format=esm --external '*' && bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile=./dist/index.cjs --target=node --format=cjs --external '*'
scripts.pretest: docker compose up -d && (for i in $(seq 1 30); do docker compose exec -T db pg_isready -U postgres && break || (sleep 1; [ $i -eq 30 ] && exit 1); done)
scripts.pretest:perf: docker compose -f docker-compose.perf.yaml up -d && (for i in $(seq 1 30); do docker compose -f docker-compose.perf.yaml exec -T db pg_isready -U postgres && break || (sleep 1; [ $i -eq 30 ] && exit 1); done)
